title: Champions to turn the game around.
body: I have been playing ranked a lot and lose quite a bit since the enemy team wrecks us at late game and there isn't much we can do since they are so fed. I was wondering if there champions that can turn the game around when all seems to be lost but can still be won with this champ. I would like the help thnx!

replies.body:
ZIGGS 

This little piece of %%%% literally stops all pushing, it's deadset near 100% impossible to push against this rat unless your like 20 kills down. The amount of games I lost when he was popular just because he forced the game into a 50 min farm off is insane.

Lissandra is a champ that can be very useful behind or ahead and her single target lockdown can greatly affect a teamfight all you have to do id get to the carry which is the tricky part. {{champion:127}} ?
Jinx is pretty good, her attack speed buff can rip through towers even if she is super behind (only problem is her squishiness)
Yeah jynx is really good for carrying she carries the fights like really hard she has cc and lots of damage.

Well Viktor can one shot the wave using his laser and he also has an aoe stun and massive aoe burst and great kite potential.

Also I'd say orianna has the greatest carry potential in the game if played well.

To be completely honest, you are looking at it all wrong. It is not the job for one to do the job of many, you need to work with your team to come back from behind. Communicate with pings, keep wards up, and maintain objective control.

If you are talking about backdooring however, then any AD champ or champ with high attack speed or abilities that change AA's into more powerful versions, like Garen's Q, can wreck towers faster than others.

such champs include:
{{champion:11}} Master Yi, {{champion:17}} Teemo, {{champion:421}} Rek'sai, {{champion:78}} Poppy, {{champion:5}} Xin Zhao, and pretty much any ADC out there, since they mostly all build AS and AD anyway.

You'll find that AP casters will be a lot slower than others to destroy towers. If you are a caster, then continue to try and poke the enemy's HP down without a full blown engage. Keep them distracted, but not satisfied enough to glance at the map and see a Teemo clearing waves and destroying towers up top with his Ruunan's

It sometimes is the job when you have an afk or a feeding team but yes it is true it's a game about team work but not all the time. Most of the time I need to carry since the team is angry at everyone and blaims them for their deaths so thats' why I need to carry. But anyway thank you for the tips.
